title: Sarath Fonseka letter to Sri Lanka Elections Commission
content: Source: BBC – Pic – Reuters Excerpts of a letter by Gen Sarath Fonseka to Sri Lanka’s Elections Commission, following his defeat in the presidential poll. The letter has been translated from Sinhala. “Dear commissioner of elections.
